content: One example of a scholarly article that shows evidence that gamification and interactivity can increase reading comprehension among children is "Game-based learning and student engagement: A study of the effect of Quizizz on student engagement and performance" by N.J. Draper, D.C. Brown, and D. Henderson published in the Journal of Learning Analytics in 2016. The study found that the use of the game-based learning platform Quizizz led to higher student engagement and performance compared to traditional instruction methods.
